Name: New Retro Arcade: Neon
About the game: New Retro Arcade: Neon is an Emulator Frontend where you can add and play your own game ROMs in Virtual Reality. ( Can be played without a VR headset ) There is support for over 30 arcade cabinets, 18 console cartridges and 10 handheld games for you to setup and play using your personal collection of game ROM's and our Arcade Builder tool. With over 10 mini games including Zombie Problem II, Aimbot, Bowling, Air Hockey and Skeeball, there are plenty of memories to relive! Thank you so much for checking out our Steam store page. We are actively developing the game and cannot thank you enough for your support. Don't miss an update: Join us on Discord , Facebook and Twitter .
